hypothesis_text: Active religious practice rates differ by biological sex.
notes: Religion recoded as any value >0 for active practice; SRS assumption.

hypothesis_text: Higher childhood religious strictness associates with greater adult happiness change.
variables: ['externalreligion','On average, I am happier as an adult than I was in childhood (h33e6gg)']

hypothesis_text: Net worth brackets correlate with work/career satisfaction.
variables: ['networth','I am satisfied with my work/career life (z0mhd63)']
notes: Will explore ordinal associations after weight confirmation.

hypothesis_text: Self-reported depression tendency aligns with stress sensitivity.
variables: ['I tend to suffer from depression (wz901dj)','I'm quite sensitive to stress (qhyti2r)-neg']
notes: Requires scale harmonization and privacy review.

hypothesis_text: Older respondents report higher counts of lifetime sexual partners.
variables: ['selfage','How many people have you had sex with? (ewvvaz2)']
notes: Assess monotonic trend with count models under SRS assumption.
